attributes.action: Introduce legislation to force pedal cycles to be registered and insured for accident and injuries to third parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anybody who is involved in an accident with a pedal cycle has no redress for compensation as they do for any other vehicle. It is time to give pedestrians and other road users the same redress as they get when involved with other road vehicles.
